Theme Description:

Very Special Romantic Windows 7 Themes to spread the love between the married and engaged Persons and to refresh our feelings with love in our life and in the whole world.

Romantic Love Hearts Windows 7 Theme consists of:
- 28 !! Romantic Wallpapers full of cute Love Hearts that you will adore them
- Very wonderful red heart cursors
- Romantic and bird sounds
- Amazing Romantic Love and birds Sounds
- to install just double click on the Thempack file
